videos.headline: Akron's Shawn Featherstone nabs a INT
videos.description: Shawn Featherstone's 41-yard interception return puts the Zips Red Hawks' territory.

videos.headline: Akron cashes turnover in for TD
videos.description: Kato Nelson's runs in seven yards for the touchdown to put Akron up 7-0.

videos.headline: Ragland to Martin ties the game for Miami, OH
videos.description: Gus Ragland hits Sam Martin for a 19-yard touchdown pitch and catch to tie the game 7-7 in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Chapmon hauls in TD for Akron
videos.description: Kato Nelson finds Tra'von Chapman for a 30-yard touchdown to close the margin for Akron  early in the fourth quarter.
